declarations.name: FormRequiredIfElement
declarations.description: Web component that enables fields to be required based on the value(s) of other fields.

attributes.name: conditions
attributes.description: A double pipe (||) separated list of `name`/`value` pairs that, if true, would make this field required

attributes.name: indicator
attributes.description: An optional attribute declaring the “required” indicator to be added to the label.

attributes.name: indicator-position
attributes.description: Optional attribute declaring where the indicator should be placed (before or after).
